name: docker-compose Postgres+App 最小
description: Postgres とアプリの最小 compose

files.template:
version: '3.8'
services:
  db:
    image: postgres:15
    environment: [ POSTGRES_PASSWORD=pass ]
  app:
    build: .
    environment: [ DATABASE_URL=postgres://postgres:pass@db:5432/postgres ]
    depends_on: [ db ]
